intro: Cnicus erisithales, commonly known as the yellow centaury, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its bright yellow flowers and hairy, lobed leaves. The plant typically grows in dry, sunny habitats such as rocky soils and open fields. It is native to Europe and parts of Asia, where it thrives in temperate climates. The species is often found in disturbed areas and is known for its ornamental value in gardens.
